scripts.serve:electron: set APP_IS_NIGHTLY=yes && set APP_IS_DEV=yes && yarn build && wait-on tcp:3000 && electron .
scripts.app:build: yarn prod:rename && yarn build:front && yarn electron:build && yarn electron:builder
scripts.app:build:nightly: set APP_IS_NIGHTLY=yes && set APP_IS_DEV=no && yarn nightly:rename && yarn build:front && yarn electron:build && yarn electron:builder
scripts.nightly:rename: json -I -f package.json -e "this.name='smmo-yaka'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.productName='SMMO Yaka'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.appId='com.smmo-aka.app'"
scripts.prod:rename: json -I -f package.json -e "this.name='smmo-yaka'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.productName='SMMO Yaka'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.appId='com.smmo-aka.app'"
